UseComputerNameForComputerRecordName.title: Set Computer Name To Computer Record Name
UseComputerNameForComputerRecordName.description: If true, sets the computer name to the current record name in Jamf. This may not even allow Jamf to change the computer name after applied.

TALLogoutSavesState.title: Save State On Logout
TALLogoutSavesState.description: If true, open windows will be reopened when logging back in. If false, they will not. Users will not be asked.

EnableExternalAccounts.title: Enable External Accounts
EnableExternalAccounts.description: If set to true, allows external accounts other than AD accounts to login.

DisableFDEAutoLogin.title: Disable Automatic Login If FileVault Is Enabled
DisableFDEAutoLogin.description: If true, disables the automatic login option when using FileVault. After entering the filevault password, the user will see the standard login screen.

AdminMayDisableMCX.title: Admin May Disable Management
AdminMayDisableMCX.description: If true, Mac computer administrators may refresh content or disable management.

DisableConsoleAccess.title: Disable Console Login
DisableConsoleAccess.description: If true, disregards the >console special user name, which will provide a command line UI.

com.apple.login.mcx.DisableAutoLoginClie.title: Disable Automatic Login
com.apple.login.mcx.DisableAutoLoginClie.description: If set to true, automatic login is disabled.
